subsection_content: Pre-diabetes can progress to type 2 diabetes if the patient does not adjust their diet, live a healthy lifestyle, and exercise regularly. Even if it has not progressed to type 2 diabetes, with a metabolic disorder, you can have high blood pressure, blurred vision, increased bad cholesterol, damage to the heart, blood vessels, and stroke. , fatty liver, eye and kidney damage. Studies show that prediabetes is linked to unexplained heart attacks.
subsection_title: tien tieu duong.json. Is prediabetes dangerous?
subsection_data:
tien tieu duong.json. Is prediabetes dangerous?
Pre-diabetes can progress to type 2 diabetes if the patient does not adjust their diet, live a healthy lifestyle, and exercise regularly. Even if it has not progressed to type 2 diabetes, with a metabolic disorder, you can have high blood pressure, blurred vision, increased bad cholesterol, damage to the heart, blood vessels, and stroke. , fatty liver, eye and kidney damage. Studies show that prediabetes is linked to unexplained heart attacks.
